page.title: 09 BIOGRAPHY OF PENSIONER
page.content: Every Thursday in Litcham there is a Silver Lining club,where nearly all the old aged pensioners get together and do things like sewing,bingo and they also watch the television. When they wake up they usually make a cup of tea and listen to the radio. Then they will start on the housework or tidy up the garden.The housework they do is:vacuum cleaning the house and the washing.Most old aged people are not allowed to do much housework as they have some serious illnesses.If they do not feel well they can just go across the road to the doctors as the Health Centre is opposite the old aged pensioners home. Although this lifestyle seems dull and boring,most of the old people enjoy living in Litcham and the slow pace of life suits them.
